item.title: Donald Trump says FBI agents raided his Mar-a-Lago Florida home
item.description: Monday's search was reportedly linked to an investigation into Mr Trump's handling of official papers.

item.title: Serena Williams suggests retirement from tennis after US Open
item.description: Tennis great Serena Williams has suggested she is set to retire, saying she will be "evolving away" from the sport after the US Open.

item.title: Sania Khan: She TikToked her divorce, then her husband killed her
item.description: Feeling stigmatised after her divorce, Sania Khan found community on TikTok - then her ex returned.

item.title: Fetty Wap jailed after being accused of threatening to kill man
item.description: The US rapper is accused of threatening to kill the man on a FaceTime call in December 2021.

item.title: Actor Ezra Miller charged with burglary
item.description: The embattled star allegedly broke into an unoccupied home in May to steal bottles of alcohol.

item.title: Timed Teaser: How did this diver make waves?
item.description: Test your knowledge of the news these last few days - 10 questions, 10 seconds each. Go!

item.title: Ukraine war: Blasts rock Russian airbase in annexed Crimea
item.description: Black smoke is seen rising from the territory, which Russia annexed from Ukraine in 2014.

item.title: China-Taiwan: What we learned from Beijing's drills around the island
item.description: Beijing redefines what is "acceptable" even as Taiwanese attitudes appear to be hardening further.

item.title: Anne Heche: US actress remains in critical condition after car crash
item.description: The Donnie Brasco actress remains in a coma after her car crashed into a house in Los Angeles.

item.title: Olivia Newton-John: Tributes to Grease star and singer dies aged 73
item.description: Best known for playing Sandy in Grease, the actor and singer has died from cancer aged 73.

item.title: US doctor issues warning of many undiagnosed polio cases
item.description: The New York State medic says there could be hundreds, or even thousands, of infected people there.

item.title: Indian temple idol stolen in 1971 found in New York
item.description: The idol of Goddess Parvati was one of five stolen from a temple in Tamil Nadu state in 1971.

item.title: Ukraine conflict: Ban Russian visitors, Zelensky urges West
item.description: Ukraine's call for a widespread ban has also been supported by Estonia, Latvia and Finland.

item.title: Issey Miyake: Japanese fashion designer dies aged 84
item.description: The revolutionary designer died of liver cancer in Tokyo aged 84, his company said in a statement.

item.title: South Korea: Eight dead as floods submerge streets of Seoul
item.description: Some of South Korea's heaviest rain in decades caused power cuts and swept cars across the city.

item.title: West Bank: Al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades commander Ibrahim al-Nabulsi killed in Nablus
item.description: Ibrahim al-Nabulsi, commander of al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigades in Nablus, had escaped arrest before.

item.title: US officials concerned as Russia launches Iranian satellite
item.description: The US has warned Russia plans to maintain use of the satellite to spy on Ukrainian troop movements.

item.title: Kenya Elections 2022: Raila Odinga and William Ruto in tight race for president
item.description: A largely peaceful election day was marred by some delays and a small number of technical problems.

item.title: Four-day extreme heat warning issued in UK
item.description: The Met Office says temperatures will be below July's record highs - but this heatwave will last longer.

item.title: Leandro Lo: Funeral held for killed Jiu-Jitsu champion
item.description: World champion Leandro Lo, 33, was shot in the head while attending a concert at a club in São Paulo.

item.title: China housing crisis: The people living in unfinished apartments
item.description: As Chinese developers spiral into debt, people with nowhere else to live have moved into unfinished apartments.

item.title: Bolivia's 'death road' becomes wildlife haven
item.description: Wildlife flourishes on the infamous route linking Bolivia's capital with the Amazon rainforest.

item.title: Country pop to black spandex - the life of Olivia Newton-John
item.description: The Grammy award-winning singer found enduring fame in the film Grease.

item.title: How I taught a vulture to fly with me
item.description: Brazilian tour guide Israel Mendes adopted Urú, a vulture, after finding him abandoned in a bin.

item.title: Are we falling in love with robots?
item.description: Far from being scary, people who actually live with robots are finding them endearing.

item.title: In pictures: Drought hits Europe's rivers and crops
item.description: Weeks of baking heat have caused big problems for Europe's food producers and river traffic.

item.title: The newborns fighting for survival in Afghanistan
item.description: The BBC visits a ward where mothers are forced to share beds and have no access to pain relief.

item.title: The woman who found a new life after being given six weeks to live
item.description: In 2015, Andrea Sheardown was diagnosed with a rare liver cancer and given just six weeks to live.

item.title: Flash flooding swamps California's Death Valley
item.description: Nearly 1,000 staff and visitors were unable to leave as all roads in and out were closed.

item.title: US President Biden leaves White House for first time since Covid
item.description: The US president is leaving for his home state of Delaware after testing negative for the virus.

item.title: The plans for giant seaweed farms in European waters
item.description: As worldwide sales of the algae soar, the European Union wants to establish giant seaweed farms.

item.title: Horniman Museum to return 72 artefacts to Nigeria
item.description: The chair of the Horniman Museum said it was "moral" to return items taken by "force" years ago.

item.title: Mexican mining rescue: Ten miners trapped underground
item.description: The 10 workers are stuck underground in Coahuila after a tunnel wall collapsed in a mine shaft.

item.title: Gambling disorder: 'It took me to save Peter Shilton'
item.description: Ex-England player Peter Shilton's wife, Steph, on living with a gambling addict and helping others.

item.title: US Senate passes sweeping climate, tax and healthcare package
item.description: The bill seeks to lower the cost of medicines, increase corporate taxes and reduce carbon emissions.

item.title: Biden is passing laws - but is he winning hearts?
item.description: The paradox of Joe Biden's presidency is his unpopularity despite the success of his legislative agenda.

item.title: How big are Donald Trump's legal problems?
item.description: As he plots his political future, criminal probes and multiple lawsuits could spell trouble.

item.title: Olivia Newton-John: Australia mourns a national sweetheart
item.description: The singer was UK-born and found fame in the US, but Australians will always claim her as their own.

item.title: Israel-Gaza: Unusual pre-emptive hit by Israel pays off
item.description: The truce brings relief to Gazans, but the lack of a peace process means this is only temporary.

item.title: Sanya Covid lockdown: Escaping to 'China's Hawaii' only to face fresh curbs
item.description: Many in Sanya had arrived hoping for relief from strict Covid-control measures in bigger cities.

item.title: Afghanistan: The Taliban sniper now working behind a desk
item.description: A year after the Taliban took over Afghanistan, the BBC returns to see how people's lives have changed.

item.title: Panama Canal grapples with climate change threat
item.description: Changes in rainfall and weather patterns are making the Panama Canal's operation more challenging.

item.title: Ukraine round-up: Russia's tech weakness and latest fighting
item.description: A study shows how Russian arms depend on Western components - and a nuclear plant remains a major concern.

item.title: Ukraine war in maps: Tracking the Russian invasion
item.description: Ukrainian troops are attempting to retake the southern city of Kherson as fighting continues in the east.

item.title: Derby County: How one of England's historic clubs was saved from a wild ride to ruin
item.description: Derby County were founder members of the Football League in 1888. This year they were saved from potential liquidation.

item.title: Marko Arnautovic: Manchester United end interest in Bologna striker
item.description: Manchester United end their interest in Bologna's former West Ham and Stoke forward Marko Arnautovic.

item.title: Lewis Hamilton says that turning down Top Gun role from Tom Cruise was 'upsetting'
item.description: Lewis Hamilton says he had to tell actor and friend Tom Cruise that he could not take a role in blockbuster film Top Gun: Maverick.

item.title: Tyson Fury: WBC champion urges Derek Chisora to accept trilogy offer
item.description: Tyson Fury hints he is on the verge of a return to fighting after calling out Derek Chisora.

item.title: Eddie Jones: England head coach admonished by RFU over private school system criticism
item.description: England head coach Eddie Jones is admonished by the Rugby Football Union for criticising the system's reliance on private schools.
